import './index.scss' import { Link, NavLink } from "react-router-dom" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faHome, faSearch, faTshirt, faBars, faClose, faUsers, faUser } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import L from '../../assets/images/ball2.png' import { useState } from 'react' const Sidebar = () => { const [showNav, setShowNav] = useState(false) return (
setShowNav(false)} /> setShowNav(false)} /> setShowNav(false)} /> setShowNav(false)} /> setShowNav(false)} /> setShowNav(false)} />
setShowNav(true)} icon={faBars} color="#ffd700" size="3x" className="hamburger-icon" />
) } export default Sidebar
